Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:



Nemesis Enforcer raised his rifle, firing 5 rapid laser bolts off at 
DeathStorm's abdomen.  "Understood, Zardus.  I suggest getting to a CR 
chamber."
Nemesis Enforcer gripped DeathStorm's limp body, putting it over his 
shoulder, and heading towards the lab, Scattershot following.
